title: Get CAR MODEL-has-successor Relationship
description:
* The ›has-successor‹ relationship for the selected CAR MODEL is returned when one exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* The response contains the relationship ID, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* An empty response is returned when the selected CAR MODEL has no ›has-successor‹ relationship. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a CAR MODEL. -> Status Code \`404\`
